title: Genesis Chapter 16 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 16 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: According to Genesis 16:16, who was fourscore and six years old?
questions.explanation: Genesis 16:16 states: "And Abram was fourscore and six years old, when Hagar bare Ishmael to Abram."

questions.question: Where was Sarai according to Genesis 16:3?

questions.question: In Genesis 16:15, Abram called his son's name.
questions.explanation: This is correct. Genesis 16:15 states: "And Hagar bare Abram a son: and Abram called his son's name, which Hagar bare, Ishmael."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 16:1: "Now Sarai ______'s wife bare him no children: and she had an handmaid, an Egyptian, whose name was Hagar."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Now Sarai Abram's wife bare him no children: and she had an handmaid, an Egyptian, whose name was Hagar."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 16:4: "And he went in unto ______, and she conceived: and when she saw that she had conceived, her mistress was despised in her eyes."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 16:7: "And the ______ of the LORD found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to Shur."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the angel of the LORD found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to Shur."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 16:8: "And he said, Hagar, ______'s maid, whence camest thou? and whither wilt thou go? And she said, I flee from the face of my mistress ______."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 16:9: "And the ______ of the LORD said unto her, Return to thy mistress, and submit thyself under her hands."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the angel of the LORD said unto her, Return to thy mistress, and submit thyself under her hands."
